p: Most studies of the Sundance Seaway predate modern sequence stratigraphical concepts (e.g. Imlay 1947, 1956, 1967; Peterson 1954). Three recent studies on the Gypsum Spring and Sundance formations of the Bighorn Basin, Wyoming, have developed the sequence stratigraphical framework used in this study (Parcell & Williams 2005; McMullen etÂ al. 2014; Clement & Holland 2016). We have extended this across Wyoming, into adjacent parts of South Dakota, Montana and Idaho; this extended sequence stratigraphical framework will be published separately.
